Production Weightings: Countries' share as a % of EU-28 for Total Industry (except construction)

Source: R/datasets.R
weights_pi_eu28.Rd

A dataset containing the EU-28 countries and the respective weights

data(weights_pi_eu28)

Format

A data.frame with 28 rows and 2 columns.

Details

  • country. EU-28 country

  • weight. weight of the respective country

References

See https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/documents/2995521/9490436/4-14012019-AP-EN.pdf/9d606acd-97bc-4a5b-8c4c-a270888aab0a
